bio.value:
Herman Melville was an American novelist, short story writer, essayist and poet who is often classified as part of dark romanticism. He is best known for his novel Moby-Dick and novella Billy Budd, the latter of which was published posthumously. ([Source][1].)

[1]:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herman_Melville

name: Herman Melville
alternate_names: Herman; Laxe Freire, Manuel Anxo (Trad.) Melville
title: Schriftsteller, USA
